attributes.action: Allow Dr. Kandiah to continue his excellent work at Sparcells Surgery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The patients group would like to see Dr. Kandiah back at Sparcells Surgery which he has run successfully for 20 years.  We also object to any planned merger of Sparcells Surgery with any other practice,

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
